DOC.brief_summary: Adjuvant therapy prove effective treat early stage less advanced non-small-cell lung cancer . This study design evaluate efficacy icotinib adjuvant therapy treat stage IIA-IIIA adenocarcinoma patient EGFR mutation . The primary endpoint disease-free survival .
DOC.brief_title: Icotinib Adjuvant Therapy Patients With Stage IIA-IIIA Adenocarcinoma With EGFR Mutation
